tool_description: Extract structured data from any web page in seconds with just a website URL! Our API can extract microformats, Schema.org, Open Graph, HTML microdata, and RDFa. Use case of this API may include extracting product data such as product description and product price or information about any job or recipe.
name: Extract Structured Data From Web Page
title: Extract Structured Data From Web Page
tool_name: Extract Structured Data From Web Page

api_list.name: URL
api_list.description:
Enter an encoded url e.g https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FMicrodata_%28HTML%29
to fetch structed data from the webpage.
